Disha Patani Looks Beautiful In These Stunning Pictures
Disha Patani Looks Beautiful In These Stunning Pictures
Disha Patani made her debut with a Telugu film Loafer opposite Varun Tej in 2015. In 2016, she appeared in a music video Befikra along with Tiger Shroff and came into limelight. She made her foray into Bollywood in Neeraj Pandey's MS Dhoni: The Untold Story, a biographical sports drama based on the life story of former India captain MS Dhoni. She played the role of Priyanka Jha, Dhoni's girlfriend in the movie who dies in an accident. The film went on to become one of the highest-grossers. After Dhoni's biopic, Disha was also a part of Jackie Chan's Kung Fu Yoga, which didn't do well in the box office.
After that, Disha starred along side Tiger Shroff in Baaghi 2 (2018), a sequel to 2016 hit Baaghi. Directed by Ahmed Khan, the film earned over Rs. 243 crore.

title: Disha Patani Looks Beautiful In These Stunning Pictures
description: Disha Patani is an Indian actress. She began her career with the Telugu film Loafer, opposite Varun Tej, and followed it by playing the leading lady in the Hindi sports film M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story and the action film Baaghi 2. Here are some beautiful images of Disha Patani:
